code: import axios from"axios";import{API_URL}from"../constants";export var getCoinPrices=function getCoinPrices(id,days,priceType){var prices=axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id,"/market_chart?vs_currency=usd&days=").concat(days,"&interval=daily")).then(function(response){if(priceType=="market_caps"){return response.data.market_caps;}else if(priceType=="total_volumes"){return response.data.total_volumes;}else{return response.data.prices;}}).catch(function(error){console.log("ERROR>>>",error);});if(prices){return prices;}else{return;}};
